choices: A strange scent fills the air
Something lashes out and grabs her.
1.content:
They warned the students daily.

"Never go into the woods unescorted" they would say

"Never go in the woods unarmed and untrained." They would say.

"Monsters around every corner, just waiting to gobble up a tasty young witch or wizard." They would tell them.

But foolish young Amy was always curious. She often wondered if they told them that just so they wouldn't get adventurous and wander off into those woods.

She sighed as she looked out the window of the study hall. It looked so beautiful and peaceful there, yet she had to admit it did look rather dangerous too. She'd heard stories. That there were all kinds of crazy dangers in there. From snakes to plants, Trolls looking for a good warm meal and, her favorite, a group of slavers that had a camp deep inside the woods that would capture any girl foolish enough to come near and sell her into slavery. She shutterd a bit. Bondage was her biggest fetish and for some reason, despite the danger, the thought of someone tying her up tight and forcing her on her knees made her super horny.

She pushed the thought out of her head and went back to studying her magic. She didn't know much as she'd just started at the academy a few months ago. at best she could cast a little light ball and could cast a fireball. Right now she was studying a teleportation spell. You had to concentrate on your desired target, but without a direct line of sight it was impossible. She sighed and began to cast the spell as best she could when suddenly her eyes averted to the forest instead of the ring in front of her. Without warning she felt herself being transported somewhere with a huge gust of winds!


She let out a yelp as he landed hard on her bottom. "oW! What the heck!" She yelled as she got up and dusted her robes off. She than bit her lip and nearly shrieked out of both fear and pleasure as she realized...she'd accidently teleported herself into the forest. She looked through her pouch and took out a mana potion, herr only one and downed it. She sighed knowing that she was going to have to try and find her way back as the academy made it impossible to teleport back without a teacher's permission. She looked around and started heading in a random direction. After about an hour she was almost in tears. "Oh man...I'm lost..." She said with a panic.... "What should I do?? Where do I go?!"
1.title: A foolish witch alone in the woods

info.brief_description: A young witch is lost in a place where everything wants her young flesh...
info.description:
Amy 's teachers always warn the students about the forbidden woods near their academy and the dangers that lie withen. Between a sadistic Snake that loves to hypnotize youing women into being his meals, a group of trolls with a rather large stew pot, woman eating plants and even a band of sex slavers, it's a terrible place for someone as young and beautiful as Amy to venture. Alas, She accidently casts a complicated spell that teleports her right into the middle of those woods! Will the young, 18 year old which make it home, or she doomed to meet a terrible fate in those woods? Does a Snake's belly have her name on it? Is she going to be rooted by a plant? Is Amy Stew on the menu tonight? Or perhaps she'll spend the rest of her days, sucking cocks and getting gang raped. Only you can save poor Amy from a terrible fate.

What Amy Looks like:

Amy is a beautiful 18 year old blonde haired witch. She wears standard which robes, high heels and lets her long hair flow freely. She is about 5'3 so she's pretty short, perfect size for a belly no?

Amy's Ablities:

Amy knows some basic spells, though she was never the bright. She nearly flunked out of school several times....

She starts out at 10/10 mana and each spell she casts costs mana. Mana can be regenerated if she rests, however if she loses all her mana she will grow weak and be helpless to whatever fate is before her.

Light ball: Amy can have a small orb of light follow her around for short periods of time. Mana cost: 1

Fire ball: Efective against trolls especially but also costs a lot of Mana, Mana Cost: 5

Teleport: She can teleport short distances, but this should only be used to escape! Mana cost: 9

She can learn other spells as she goes along and can get stronger in her mana.

Amy's Weaknesses:

She is very ticklish on her soles and sides and can be tickled into submission. Each minute she's tickled she loses 2 Mana points.

Bondage also tends to make her very horny. Getting horny costs her 1 mana per minute.
Being tied up and tickled would be an almost guaranteed game over for the poor girl

Having sex will drain all her mana and make her very submissive.
